docs.text: ⬇️ ghinstall ghinstall is a GitHub-based CLI tool that installs repositories via a public permission system. ⚙️ Built in Shell. 🔒 Permission-checked via ghinstall.github.io . 📦 Installs public GitHub repos with style. Made with ❤️ by Andrew Baki. Copyright © 2025.
docs.title: 🏠 Home

docs.text: ghinstall is a GitHub-based CLI tool that installs repositories via a public permission system. ⚙️ Built in Shell. 🔒 Permission-checked via ghinstall.github.io . 📦 Installs public GitHub repos with style. Made with ❤️ by Andrew Baki. Copyright © 2025.
docs.title: ⬇️ ghinstall

docs.text: 🛠️ Installation Download the latest relase here Add this to your ~/.bashrc or ~/.zshrc : source ~/.ghinstall/ghinstall.sh Run this to create a working directory: mkdir -p ~/.ghinstall Move the downloaded file to ~/.ghinstall Made with ❤️ by Andrew Baki. Copyright © 2025.
